verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice! For the steps of a righteous man
They are ordered of God.
They are ordered of God.
Rejoice! For the steps of a righteous man,
They are ordered of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the time of trouble, God will uphold him.
God will preserve him, God will sustain him.
In the time of trouble, God will lift him up.
So, rejoice; your steps are ordered of God.
